comment.author: 70994841@N07
comment._content: This photograph was almost certainly taken by Henry Mobsby, photographer to the Queensland Government Intelligence and Tourist Bureau and the organizer of the Queensland Court in the Australian Pavilion at the Panama-Pacific International Exposition in San Francisco in 1915. He was a relative of mine and I have a set pertaining to that expo: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/hwmobs/sets/72157629553173584/]

comment.author: 32605636@N06
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/hwmobs] Whatbgreatbphotographs in your set. We have a number of works by your relative in our collection. Thanks for connecting us to your set from the San Franciso Exposition.

comment.author: 70994841@N07
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/statelibraryqueensland] You're very welcome. I was aware of your collection of his work and of the other libraries as well. I am so happy to be able to show his work here on Flickr. As mentioned in my profile, he had no descendants and we are his closest family, so I felt his work deserved whatever recognition I could give it.
